title: I've dc'ed in league but not my pc?
body: I cant' reconnect to chat or rejoin my game, but I can use the internet for everything else wtf?

replies.body: It sounds like you're specifically having problems connecting to the game server, even if your internet is fine.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed!  Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=iMJqG8La,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-26T15:42:15.965+0000)
>
> It sounds like you're specifically having problems connecting to the game server, even if your internet is fine.  Check out our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed!  Let me know if you have any questions.

it said www.microsoft,com is not responding, I've never seenit before restarted my pc and its fine
